text: I am Larry Hueber, the cofounder of an online insurance broker.
I founded the group with my brother Romain Hueber in 2014. Our role is quite simple;
it’s about Personal Health, Funeral, Borrowing, and Animal Health.
We centralize the demands and we try to find you the best deal.
We centralize the demands and we try to find you the best deal.
For us the number one challenge is that we make a huge number of calls, and we need a high-speed host,
95% of contracts are made by telephone
we operated on a smaller tool before, so we had problems with calls, problems in call quality and call volume.

This problem was taken care of by AWS because
it is truly infinitely scalable.
With AWS, we have been able to do what we call smart calling,
this allows for a much greater fluidity, better sales figures, and improved management service.
Thanks to smart calls, we bring in 10% more revenue every month, which makes more than 4 million euros per year.
When we implemented the Amazon Connect plugged-in solution...
our call quality was better and collaboration between agents was better.
Between Amazon and the Salesforce, the two solutions have allowed us to really have top level results.
and obtain the objectives that we never thought possible before.
Why AWS? Because as a small to medium sized business, our objective was to absorb the growth and think like a big group.
it’s a bit the same principle as the one of Salesforce—at the beginning, we’d be followers and not leaders
but if actually we have a long-term vision, we will be leaders one day.
Instead of getting lots of small tools and at the end end up with a big one,  might as well use a big one from the beginning.
